name: Bullet Ultra
description:
Current Version - V1.0

PS4 Controller Support

New in V1.0:

- High score system

- Added a controls screen to the main menu

- Changed the layout of the in-game UI

Bullet Ultra is a defence-style FPS game where you have to fight off endless waves of enemies using a wide range of weaponry! With different variants of enemies, each wave will be completely different and grow in difficulty. How long will you last?
